LineageFlags.description: Set of flags to control lineage search behavior

entitiesExploredPerHopLimit.description: Limits number of entities explored per hop

startTimeMillis.description: Start time for lineage edges to filter

endTimeMillis.description: End time for lineage edges to filter

ignoreAsHops.description:
Map of entity type to list of platform urns to ignore as hops during graph walk. Note: this can potentially cause
a large amount of additional hops to occur and should be used with caution.
